title: Manmohan seeks advice of Karunanidhi on Sri Lanka issue
content: CHENNAI: Prime Minister Manmohan Singh has sought the views and advice of Chief Minister M. Karunanidhi to accelerate the process of genuine reconciliation to resolve the ethnic issue in Sri Lanka.
